span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含的集合物件，其中每個包含集合物件。The class contains a collection of objects, which each contain a collection of objects. 類別可用來以程式設計方式建立、 存取和修改個別的屬性新增至定義``的子區段``組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `` subsection of the `` section of a configuration file. ``組態檔的區段會指定使用者設定檔的結構描述。The `` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在執行階段，ASP.NET 編譯系統會使用指定的資訊``一節，以產生類別名`ProfileCommon`，其係衍生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`類別定義根據中定義的屬性``的子區段``組態檔區段。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `` subsection of the `` section of the configuration file. 如需有關設定檔屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 如需新增到 ASP.NET 2.0 版的設定檔功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to ASP.NET version 2.0, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下列的組態檔案摘錄會示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值作為``的項目``項目``組態檔區段。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the as `` elements of the `` element of the `` configuration file section. ``` ```
